ch.iserver.ace.net
Interface PortableDocument

All Known Subinterfaces:
PortableDocumentExt
All Known Implementing Classes:
PortableDocumentImpl, ServerDocumentImpl.PortableDocumentImpl
public interface PortableDocument

A PortableDocument is a representation of a document in a portable way. PortableDocuments can be serialized in an implementation independent way and thus facilitate collaboration across application boundaries.

Method Summary

          Gets an iterator over all the fragments of the document.
